charges.charge_description: Ct 1: Illegal re-entry into the United States (found in) 8 U.S.C. 1326(a) and (b)(1)(1)

charges.charge_disposition: BOP: 142 days with credit for time served; SRT: 3 years; SA: $100 (Remitted); Fine: Waived

charges.charge_description: 8 USC 1326(a) and 1326(b): An alien who had previously been denied admission, excluded, deported, or removed, knowingly and unlawfully was present in the United States, the said defendant having not obtained the consent of the Attorney General or the Secretary of the Department of Homeland Security to reapply for admission into the United States.
